user.title: Connect to Flashforge Adventurer 5M PRO
user.description:
Set up your Flashforge Adventurer 5M PRO 3D printer for monitoring and control through Home Assistant.

You will need the printer's IP address, serial number, and check code to complete the setup.

data_description.host: The IP address or hostname of your printer on the network.
data_description.serial_number: The serial number of your printer, found on the information screen or in the mobile app.
data_description.check_code: The check code for authentication, found in the printer settings.
data_description.scan_interval: How often Home Assistant should poll the printer for updates (5-300 seconds).

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the printer. Please check the network connection and that the printer is powered on.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please check your serial number and check code.
error.connection_timeout: Connection to the printer timed out. Please check that the printer is online and reachable.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.
error.invalid_host_format: Invalid IP address or hostname format.
error.invalid_serial_format: Invalid serial number format. Should be at least 6 characters.
error.invalid_check_code_format: Invalid check code format. Should be at least 4 characters.

init.title: Flashforge Adventurer 5M PRO Options
init.description: Adjust settings for your Flashforge Adventurer 5M PRO printer.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to fetch new data from the printer. Lower values provide more frequent updates but may increase network traffic. Recommended: 10-30 seconds.
data_description.printing_scan_interval: How often to fetch data when the printer is actively printing (e.g., 1-15 seconds). More frequent updates provide real-time progress but increase load.
data_description.tcp_timeout: Timeout for individual TCP commands sent to the printer (e.g., M-codes). Range: 1-30 seconds. Default: 5 seconds.

pause_print.name: Pause Print
pause_print.description: Pause the current print job on the Flashforge printer.

resume_print.name: Resume Print
resume_print.description: Resumes a previously paused print job on the Flashforge printer.

start_print.name: Start Print
start_print.description: Start a new print job on the Flashforge printer.

file_path.name: File Path
file_path.description: Path to the G-code file on the printer's storage system (e.g., '/data/user/example.gcode' or 'example.gcode' for default user folder).

cancel_print.name: Cancel Print
cancel_print.description: Cancel the current print job on the Flashforge printer.

toggle_light.name: Toggle Light
toggle_light.description: Toggle the printer's built-in LED light on or off.

on.name: State
on.description: Set to true to turn the light on, false to turn it off.

set_extruder_temperature.name: Set Extruder Temperature
set_extruder_temperature.description: Sets the target temperature for the printer's extruder.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: Target temperature in Celsius for the extruder (e.g., 210).

set_bed_temperature.name: Set Bed Temperature
set_bed_temperature.description: Sets the target temperature for the printer's heated bed.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: Target temperature in Celsius for the bed (e.g., 60).

move_axis.name: Move Axis
move_axis.description: Moves one or more printer axes to a specified absolute position.

move_relative.name: Move Relative
move_relative.description: Moves one or more printer axes by a relative amount from the current position.

delete_file.name: Delete File
delete_file.description: Deletes a file from the printer's storage.

file_path.name: File Path
file_path.description: Full path of the file to delete on the printer (e.g., '/data/user/old_print.gcode').

disable_steppers.name: Disable Steppers
disable_steppers.description: Disables all stepper motors on the printer.

enable_steppers.name: Enable Steppers
enable_steppers.description: Enables all stepper motors on the printer.

set_speed_percentage.name: Set Speed Percentage
set_speed_percentage.description: Sets the printer's speed factor override percentage (M220).

percentage.name: Percentage
percentage.description: Speed factor percentage (e.g., 100 for normal speed, 150 for 1.5x speed).

set_flow_percentage.name: Set Flow Percentage
set_flow_percentage.description: Sets the printer's flow rate percentage (M221).

percentage.name: Percentage
percentage.description: Flow rate percentage (e.g., 100 for normal flow, 95 for 95% flow).

home_axes.name: Home Axes
home_axes.description: Homes specified axes or all axes if none are specified (G28).

axes.name: Axes
axes.description: List of axes to home (e.g., ['X', 'Y']). If omitted, all axes are homed.

emergency_stop.name: Emergency Stop
emergency_stop.description: Sends an emergency stop command to the printer (M112).

list_files.name: List Files
list_files.description: Lists files on the printer's storage (M20). (Primarily for diagnostics)

play_beep.name: Play Beep
play_beep.description: Plays a beep sound on the printer (M300).

pitch.name: Pitch (Hz)
pitch.description: Pitch of the beep in Hertz.

duration.name: Duration (ms)
duration.description: Duration of the beep in milliseconds.

start_bed_leveling.name: Start Bed Leveling
start_bed_leveling.description: Starts the automatic bed leveling process (G29).

read_settings_from_eeprom.name: Read Settings from EEPROM
read_settings_from_eeprom.description: Reads settings from EEPROM (M501). (Primarily for diagnostics)

restore_factory_settings.name: Restore Factory Settings
restore_factory_settings.description: Restores factory settings on the printer (M502).

send_gcode.name: Send G-code Command
send_gcode.description: Sends a raw G-code command directly to the printer. Use with caution, as improper commands can cause issues. Commands should typically be prefixed with '~' if required by the printer for M-codes/G-codes via TCP.

gcode_command.name: G-code Command
gcode_command.description: The raw G-code string to send to the printer (e.g., '~M105' or 'G28 X Y').
